creatureTypeSpecificTraits.name: Undead
creatureTypeSpecificTraits.description: Doesn't require food, water or sleep. Can't get Exhausted

creatureTypeSpecificTraits.name: Primordial
creatureTypeSpecificTraits.description: When it is reduced to 0 [HP] instead of dying it's energy reforms again in the Elemental Plane of it's orgin.

creatureTypeSpecificTraits.name: Immortal
creatureTypeSpecificTraits.description: Doesn't require food, water or sleep. Can't get Exhausted. When it is reduced to 0 [HP] instead of dying it goes back to the Aether where it reforms.

creatureTypeSpecificTraits.name: Incorporeal
creatureTypeSpecificTraits.description: Gain fly(1.5m) speed and you can move through walls but can't end your mvoe in there

defensiveTraits.name: Damage Resistance I
defensiveTraits.description: gain [DR] 5 + [HALF LEVEL] against a damage type of your choice except phyiscal.

defensiveTraits.name: Damage Resistance II
defensiveTraits.description: gain [DR] 15 + [LEVEL] against a damage type of your choice except phyiscal.

defensiveTraits.name: Damage Immunity
defensiveTraits.description: Gain Immunity against a damage type of your choice.

defensiveTraits.name: Status Effect Resistance
defensiveTraits.description: Gain resistance against a status effect, if you are affected by the status affect, you instead suffer a version one tier lower.

defensiveTraits.name: Status Effect Immunity
defensiveTraits.description: Gain immunity against a status effect and all it's tiers.

wargearTraits.name: Armor I
wargearTraits.description: Wear Armor to gain [DR] phyiscal 2, maneuvrepeanlty -1.

wargearTraits.name: Armor II
wargearTraits.description: Wear Armor to gain [DR] phyiscal 4, increases maneuvrepenalty to -3.

wargearTraits.name: Armor III
wargearTraits.description: Wear Armor to gain [DR] phyiscal 6, increases maneuvrepenalty to -5 and a movementpenalt of -1.

wargearTraits.name: Small Shield
wargearTraits.description: Gain shield block base of 10 and threshold of 15

wargearTraits.name: Medium Shield
wargearTraits.description: Gain shield block base of 12 and threshold of 25 with maneuvrepeanlty of -1

wargearTraits.name: Tower Shield
wargearTraits.description: Gain shield block base of 15 and threshold of 40 with maneuvrepeanlty of -3 and movement penalty of -1

otherTraits.name: Tag Team
otherTraits.description: If another creature with the same trait is within [MELEE RANGE] of a target, then the creature has [DISADVANTAGE] on any [DODGE] [SAVE] or [SHIELD BLOCK]

otherTraits.name: REGENERATION I
otherTraits.description: At the start of the Creatures [TURN] it regenerates d6 [HP].

otherTraits.name: REGENERATION II
otherTraits.description: At the start of the Creatures [TURN] it regenerates 10 [HP].

otherTraits.name: REGENERATION III
otherTraits.description: At the start of the Creatures [TURN] it regenerates 20 [HP].

otherTraits.name: Spell Eater
otherTraits.description: Each time a [TAG;Spell] Ability is used within 9m of the creature, the creature regains 1d6 + additional d6 per [TAG;Spell] Ability number and the next damaging Ability deals d6 for [TAG;Spell] Ability number.

otherTraits.name: Deadly Demise I
otherTraits.description: When the creature dies all creautre within 3m have to make [SAVE] or recieve 2d6 damage.

otherTraits.name: Deadly Demise II
otherTraits.description: When the creature dies all creautre within 4.5m have to make [SAVE] or recieve 4d6 damage.

otherTraits.name: Deadly Demise III
otherTraits.description: When the creature dies all creautre within 6m have to make [SAVE] or recieve 8d6 damage.

otherTraits.name: Fearsome I
otherTraits.description: [AURA] 6m. Any enemy creautre has to make a [WILLPOWER SAVE] vs. [DT] 10+[LEVEL]. On fail:[FRIGHTINED I]. [SAVE ENDS].

otherTraits.name: Fearsome II
otherTraits.description: [AURA] 12m. Any enemy creautre has to make a [WILLPOWER SAVE] vs. [DT] 10+[LEVEL]. On fail: [FRIGHTINED II] On success: [FRIGHTENED I]. [SAVE LOWERS].

otherTraits.name: Fearsome III
otherTraits.description: [AURA] 18m. Any enemy creautre has to make a [WILLPOWER SAVE] vs. [DT] 10+[LEVEL]. On fail: [FRIGHTINED II] On success: [FRIGHTENED II]. [SAVE LOWERS].

creatureTypeTraits.name: Mimic
creatureTypeTraits.description: If the creature remains motionless it is undistinguishable from the object it is mimicing. But can be detected with a [DT] 25 + [LEVEL] [PER] Investigation [SKILL TEST]. Each creature that touches the Mimic gets stuck on it and recieves [RESTRAINED I] [DT] 10 + [LEVEl] + [CON].

creatureTypeTraits.name: Cosmic Touched
creatureTypeTraits.description: The creature has been touched by the Aether. Increase [SPI] by 1. Get cosmic resistance equal to 5 + [HALF LEVEL] and recieve 1 random minor Cosmic Mutation.

creatureTypeTraits.name: Cosmic Blessed
creatureTypeTraits.description: The creature has been blessed by the Aether. Increase [SPI] by 2. Get cosmic resistance equal to 10 + [LEVEL] and recieve 2 random minor Cosmic Mutations and 1 Cosmic Blessing

creatureTypeTraits.name: Cosmic Corrupted
creatureTypeTraits.description: The creature has been severly corrupted by the Aether. Either through Possesion by a small demon or severe Aether exposure. Increase [SPI] by 2 and decrease [CHA] by 4. Get cosmic resistance equal to 10 + [LEVEL] and phyiscal reisistance equal to [LEVEL] and recieve 3 random minor Cosmic Mutations and 1 Major Mutation.

creatureTypeTraits.name: Cosmic Chosen
creatureTypeTraits.description: The creature has been blessed by the Aether. Increase [SPI] by 3. Get Immunity to cosmic damage and recieve 2 random minor Cosmic Mutations and 2 Cosmic Blessing and increase all other Attributes by 1.
